The Master - Spacecraft Series

To start off, the name is just random. I started playing the game while watching a movie with this title.

In this thread I want to show you some of my designs and also the way I was thinking while creating them. The oldest designs date back to march, and at the moment I'm working on Mark XVId, but I will get to that over the next few days.

MK I

While I started playing for the first time I had little idea of how it all actually works, but with trial and error came The Master Mk I -

This Basic design was just created to get to orbit. Of course, after lunching it to space I knew that some improvements were to be made.

Mk II

So it came to be -

As you can see, I kept the basic design, just edited the propoulsion. Later on I shall add a couple other Mark's of my design, for your viewing pleasure

Mk III

Didn't think it was worth sending to space, sojust one pic.

Mk IV

This is where it gets interesting In order to overcomplicate stuff, and add some nuclear engines (that was the moment I understood what ISP is).

And with the last stage came the fail. As a empty fuel tank was flying away, it took with it one of the engines.

Mk V

Actually I accidentally deleted that one so, lets move on.

Mk VI

As things get even more complicated for no apparent reason.

Mk VII

Complicate some more.

At this point the space craft was way to heavy for the old propulsion, so I created Mk VIII to solve the problem

Mk VIII

With great power comes great failure. Actually I wasn't able to get it anywhere, because 2 seconds after getting the screenshot i fell apart.

Mk IX

Here is the moment I figured out that I need to rethink my design, because however great looking it was, it wasn't practical

Tomorrow I will probably upload part 3, that will include all the newest designs, that in my opinion are very well planned
